## Variables Used:

```{r load person-level data, results = 'hide'}
person_data <- get_pums(variables = c("SEX",
                                      "JWTR",
                                      "SCHL",
                                      "PINCP",
                                      "JWMNP",
                                      "GRPIP",
                                      "AGEP"),
                        state = "08",
                        year = 2018,
                        survey = "acs1",
                        recode = TRUE) %>%
  filter(JWMNP > 0) %>%
  select(SEX_label, JWTR_label, SCHL_label, PINCP, JWMNP, GRPIP, AGEP)
```

person_data
